iqdamaqha(gm) rakSha#sO grIqvA api# kRuntAmiq yO$&smAn dvEShTiq yaM ca# vaqyaM dviqShma ityA#haq dvau vAva puru#Shauq yaM caiqva dvEShTiq yaScainaqM dvEShTiq tayO#rEqvAna#ntarAyaM grIqvAH kRu#ntati paqSavOq vai sO#maqkraya#Nyai paqdaM ~MyA#vattmUqta(gm) saM ~Mva#pati paqSUnEqvAva# rundhEq&smE rAyaq itiq saM 
~Mva#patyAqtmAna#-mEqvAddhvaqryuH - [  ] 57
